comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:54.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/54.0
Build ID: 20170713134507

Steps to reproduce:

1. Go to example URL https://www.reddit.com/r/opensource/.rss
2. You should see http://i.imgur.com/k8bGHpE.png
3. Tick the check box "always..."
4. Click "Subscribe now"
5. Repeat step 1


Actual results:

Firefox prompts me again with the note to "always..."


Expected results:

Firefox should remember my choice and not ask me again. It should only show the "subscribe now" button.
comments.author: robert@orzanna.de

comments.text: The feed preview code has been removed by bug 1477669.
